sn51.28:1.1: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam anandam bhagava etadavoca:
sn51.28:1.2: “katama nu kho, ananda, iddhi, katamo iddhipado, katama iddhipadabhavana, katama iddhipadabhavanagamini patipada”ti?
sn51.28:2.1: “Idhananda, bhikkhu anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—ekopi hutva bahudha hoti …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti—
sn51.28:3.2: Yo, ananda, maggo ya patipada iddhilabhaya iddhipatilabhaya samvattati—
